title: Lagging 90 Percent of the time., only on league.
body:
Hey guys, so as the title states, only on league of legends I lag, I have a 250+ Mbps download, and 25+ mbps upload, so my internet isn't the problem, and this only recently started happening maybe 3 weeks ago. 

Also, I don't lag every game, randomly for maybe 4 games straight I'll have 400 ms, then the next game will be the regular 40 ms, but it rarely last for more than one game? 

I get anywhere from 110-150 one game, and 300-600 another, it's really odd, and sometimes I'll for maybe 2 minutes stop lagging and it goes back up. 

Any suggestions will help, I've reinstalled the game I've tried a Public DNS and also tried a few other things but nothing seems to work Permanently,

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Your network might be suffering from some packet loss which could be due to the routing your ISP is taking to reach our game server.  I suggest running a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)to obtain an overview of your routing, and attach it in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  With this context, we'll take a look and see what we can do for you.  Thanks for your patience!
